chunks.chunk_text: 英語在幾乎所有地方,你只需要開著眼睛和耳朵,並且感興趣回到今天英語咖啡館,我們將會感興趣在今天每個人穿的衣服在台中,在Patrick在的地方我們看到很多這雙鞋子,標誌上看起來像個小男人

chunks.chunk_text: 這個品牌的鞋子是空的,就像一個空的HOLO在裡面,並不像Nike Air Max穿的Air Pockets這雙鞋子完全是HOLO,所以對我來說看起來很奇怪為什麼你會穿HOLO的鞋子呢?我必須說,之前你提到這個品牌,我們今天在聊天,我並不知道這個品牌

chunks.chunk_text: 你也不知道嗎?你現在讓我感覺到自己很好嗎?我從來沒有專注於我們在聊的鞋子我只知道大型品牌,例如Nike、Adidas、Vans、Puma誰不認識?這品牌最近出現了,而且還在增長當Nike的價格下降,但這品牌今天仍然在增長,所以我們要談談他們怎麼做到的

chunks.chunk_text: 如果你們知道我們在說什麼的話,這品牌是個小男人的品牌,在深入的看上去,這品牌叫ON,On Shoes是一個圓圈在上面,然後N在下面,讓它看起來像個小男人,所以對我來說,這品牌是一個網上品牌嗎?

chunks.chunk_text: 不是,這品牌曾經在網上,但現在變得非常流行,因為大家都在穿這款Holo Soul的鞋子,我不知道為什麼

chunks.chunk_text: Pokemon,超級有趣的!好,我第一眼看到的東西,並不是這個品牌,而是這雙鞋子,我看到這雙鞋子,我心想,你們為什麼要穿這雙鞋子?你們想穿Cheeky的鞋子嗎?你們想穿Adidas的鞋子嗎?你們想穿Light Soul的鞋子嗎?你們想穿這雙鞋子,讓它看起來像小船,快速的,但這雙ON鞋子,它們看起來像是為了走路,

chunks.chunk_text: 它們比較像走路的鞋子,我看到很多人穿它們,我只是不太認識它們。所以,如果你們是我們,今天這集的影片是為了你們,你們可以跟我們一樣更新了這個ON鞋子。好,當然,除了ON鞋子,我還看到很多HOKA鞋子。

chunks.chunk_text: 新的Adidas和Nike鞋子。是的,它們是現代品牌。它們將成為Nike和Adidas的殺手品牌。所以,我個人來說,我和ON和HOKA沒什麼問題。我的母親是HAKA。HAKA為HOKA?沒有。所以,HOKA的英文聲音有點奇怪。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: 好像真的跟客家人有一點關係。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我的觀點是,如果你去Nike和Adidas,你會經常會找到一些Nike和Adidas的鞋子,價格是2,800日圓,就在100美金之下。或者甚至更便宜的,2,800美金之下,也就是25美金之下。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: 現在,ON和HOKA,它們都在5,000日圓的價格上。是的。所以,它們應該是不錯的。它的流行性和價格,它們應該是不錯的。是的,在事實上,我的Adidas的跑車鞋,我去年在Shopee買了,在111年。它們只負責1,000日圓,所以它們很便宜。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我還不知道。我還在擔心它們很舒適,所以我不太在乎。我們不知道吧?我們不知道。好,讓我告訴你一些關於ON的事情。如果你買ON的鞋子,這就是我的學生的原因。因為我問了一遍,然後我服務了。所以,我的一位客戶,我的學生,他很喜歡穿鞋子,因為他每天都穿10K。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: 他是個大跑車手。他穿ON的鞋子,我問了他。他說,ON的鞋子品牌是從瑞士,所以是一個瑞士品牌。所以,他買了一雙在日本的跑車鞋。他買了一雙在台灣的。他說,因為某些原因,台灣的鞋子不配有瑞士的標誌。真的嗎?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以,他買了一雙在日本的跑車鞋?我們不知道。所以,我問了他。他說,很奇怪,因為他買了一雙在台灣的ON鞋子,所以它們都配有瑞士標誌。或者他發現穿的鞋子的分別是什麼?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我問了他。我說,你發現了什麼分別?或者你感覺不一樣?他說,他不知道。所以,總之,如果你們知道鞋子,如果你們知道一雙,也讓我們知道。但是,穿著瑞士標誌在你的鞋子上,讓它變得更酷,對吧?對,瑞士,你也知道瑞士品牌。所以,他們不僅是知道他們的巧克力,他們也知道他們的鞋子。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: 好,Patrick,我覺得聊夠了,讓我們給大家一個好評論,然後我們回到所有的評論。好,我們先進入他們的品牌故事。就像我們提到的部分,他們是放瑞士,蘇黎士成立了,在2010年,品牌ON。

chunks.chunk_text: 不要擔心,這些都是歐洲名字。所以,他的夥伴是David Elman和Caspar Copetti。所以,Copetti聽起來很像是意大利人。像是Spaghetti。Bernhardt是德國人,Elman也是德國人。如果你看到他們的最後一名,他們都有一些德國人在裡面。如果他們看起來有點德國人,那他們肯定是德國人。

chunks.chunk_text: 一個另外一個瑞士的職業鐵人三項運動的運動員,叫尼古拉斯皮里格。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: 因為我非常在意整個鞋子的設計。因為我非常在意整個鞋子的設計。是叫鞏技,但中間有很多橫河。是叫鞏技,但中間有很多橫河。在這段話題裡,我分享一下。在這段話題裡,我分享一下。在這段話題裡,翻譯職業鐵人一提。在這段話題裡,翻譯職業鐵人一提。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: Races, they are really extreme, right?And they have to run for 30k, so on and so forth.So it's very rigorous.So he started using garden hoses to simulate that soft landing.He saw how garden hoses can contract, can become smaller, and expand when there's water in it.So he thought, okay, garden hoses with different textures, circular textures,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: what if we have that?So that was the beginning of the whole cloud tech idea.So the cushions, the circular hollows, the square hollows in the sole, they serve as cushions.And they're supposed to absorb the impact on landing and also at the same time provide responsive springy toe-off mechanism.So your toes always forward.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: That's ON shoes.I don't know, there must be some black magic in there.But apparently, if you wear ON shoes and you move forward, you feel they call it the toe-off mechanism.So your toes are the last to leave, but you have this forward pushing motion.After your descriptions, I'd like to try one, but you know the price.5000 NT, yeah.Get budget from your CFR.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: Oh, at home first.But I wonder how he found out that, you know, the garden hose.Did he step on on purpose or just accidentally find out?Don't worry, it's a good brand story.Maybe his kids, you know, they were playing with garden hose.Okay.Sort of came up with that idea.So not to kill our sponsor, but personally, I really find the looks
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: from the side of the sole, right?You know, the hollows, they're kind of weird.Yeah.They don't look anything like we've seen before.But you know, the times nowadays when the things looks more weird with more, you'll get more attention.Yeah.So I'm not sure if he did out of the box design to attract attention or if there's real technology in it.So I'm not sure which it is.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: There's some magic in ON shoes for sure among the runners, among the triathletes.Yeah.So after 15 years, this brand is now, you know, globally been seen.A lot of country like almost over 50 countries are selling their shoes and they're like maybe 7 million runners using their products, right?And they received global attention again because Roger Federer
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: who retired recently is one of the shareholders of ON shoe company.Yeah.They even create a new, you know, series called the Roger.The Roger.So see, Nike, you didn't take the chance.You could have gotten OB and you could have gotten Roger.I think they never thought about this brand can live for like 15 years after this.Yeah.I think they've struggled.Definitely.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: Yeah.So they've been around just secretively, very low profile in the market for niche people, for very niche needs.And now it's global.So go and get yourself a pair for your birthday this year.You can tell your CFO that I say so.I recommended so.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: Okay.Okay.Okay.Okay.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: Like you are always moving forward.Okay.Yeah.So you, I don't know with how they distribute the weight, but it's definitely not on center.So you're always feeling like you're slightly, your weight is slightly forward.I think that the experience so long for you is kind of weird.So far so weird.Yeah.Okay.I have to say it's super comfortable.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: Quality shoes.However, do I really enjoy the design or is the sole design for me?Not sure.I'm still getting used to it.I still consider it an acquired taste.Something you have to try.Maybe some people will love it.Some people won't.So how often do you wear this new shoes?Once or twice a week.I don't want to wear it every day.Okay.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: Too weird.But I'm trying to get used to it.Like when I'm taking a walk, let me see how I walk.And I haven't wore it extensively, but you know, it's a very good quality pair of shoes.Except the sole design, you have to try it out for yourself.Okay.I understand.Okay.I think that's the feeling.Maybe that's the true feeling on running on the clouds.You're just kind of getting used to it.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.263_ 追趕大品牌的新運動鞋昂跑滿街都是你有發現嗎The new kid on the block - ON shoes.json

chunks.chunk_text: Yeah.Are you okay running on clouds?Some people are.Some people aren't.So it's okay.Different strokes for different folks.Everybody is different.It's okay.And there's another thing that I found with ON is that apparently they are now committed to pushing technology in shoes.So what technology?Their new cloud boom strike LS model uses a light spray production method
